price: 37. Was he not a Nutfah (mixed male and female sexual discharge) of semen emitted (poured forth)?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
